get_player_role.help: Gets the player role and other associated roles.
get_player_role.success: Your player roles have been given.

reschedule.accepted: :white_check_mark: %1, your reschedule for the match %2 has been accepted.
reschedule.duplicate_match_id: There are multiple matches with this ID. Please contact an admin.
reschedule.impossible_reschedule: Sorry, the time to which you want to reschedule your match is not acceptable. You can try contacting an admin to reschedule your match.
reschedule.invalid_minute: Invalid minutes. You can use either 00, 15, 30 or 45. Example: `17:15` is valid, `17:16` is not.
reschedule.invalid_match: You can't reschedule a match you're not in.
reschedule.no_staff_notification: The match %1 (%2 vs %3) has been rescheduled from %4 to %5.
reschedule.no_tournament: This server does not have any tournament running. Consider using the `%1create_tournament $tosurnament/create_tournament/parameter`.
reschedule.not_team_captain: You're not the team captain of your team, you can't use this command.
reschedule.past_deadline: Sorry, the deadline to reschedule your match is passed. You can try contacting an admin to reschedule your match.
reschedule.refused: :x: %1, your reschedule for the match %2 has been refused.
reschedule.removed_from_match: %1, you have successfully been removed from the match %2.
reschedule.same_date: You can't reschedule your match to the time it is already scheduled to.
reschedule.staff_notification: Hi %1! The match %2 (%3 vs %4) has been rescheduled from %5 to %6. If you can't arbitrate/stream/commentate at this new time, please add a :x: reaction to this message.
reschedule.success: Hi %1! %2 would like to reschedule the match %3 from %4 to %5. If you accept, please add a :thumbsup: reaction to this message. If you refuse, add a :thumbsdown: reaction to this message
reschedule.usage:
Usage: `%0reschedule $./parameter`

Example: `%0reschedule 12C 01/02 03:00`
Example 2: `%0reschedule 12C 3 Apr 12h30`

**Note:** You can put the the date any way you want, but if does not work like wanted, please use the `MM/dd HH:mm` format.

player_match_notification.notification:
_ _
**__Match %1__
%2 vs %3**

__Referee:__ %4

This match will start in %5 minutes.

referee_match_notification.notification:
_ _
**__Match %1__**
%2
%3 vs %4

**%5, this match will start in \~6 hours and does not have any referee.**
